葐字的基本解释

葐
pén
〔蒛葐〕见“
蒛”。

葐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fén］
［《廣韻》符分切，平文，奉。］
见“葐蒀”。

葐字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　葐； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1044第15
【唐韻】符分切，音汾。【玉篇】葐蒕，盛貌。【左思·蜀都賦】鬱葐蒕以翠微。　又【博雅】馥葐，香也。　又【集韻】步奔切，音盆。艸名。【爾雅·釋草】茥，蒛葐。【註】覆盆也，實似莓而小。【正字通】梵書謂覆葐子花曰蘇蜜那花。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋草】莖蒛葐。〕　謹照原文莖改茥。
葐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
葐字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　葐; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1044 to 15
【Tang Yun】Fu divided and cut, Yinfen. 【Jade articles】Tian Lian, grand appearance. 【Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu】Yu Ping Lian Yi Cuiwei.　[Bo Ya] Fu Fu, Xiang Ye.　[Jiyun] step by step, cutting, sound basin.艸名. 【Erya·Shucao】Thum, cypress. [Note] Raspberry is actually small but like a raspberry. [Zhengzitong] The Sanskrit script says that the flower of Fufengzi is the flower of Su Mi. Textual research: [[Erya·Shucao] Stems. 〕　I would like to change the stem according to the original text.
